abstract: Fidelity Investments‘ flagship Magellan fund sharply raised its holdings of Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase  in September, as it moved into bigger U.S. banks amid the worsening credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: Fidelity Investments‘ flagship Magellan fund sharply raised its holdings of Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase  in September, as it moved into bigger U.S. banks amid the worsening credit crisis.

headline.main: Fidelity’s Magellan Fund Buys Big Banks In September
